full_transcript: The stale smell of old beer lingers. It takes heat to bring out the odor. A cold dip restores health and zest. A salt pickle tastes fine with ham. Tacos al pastor are my favorite. A zestful food is the hot cross bun.
full_translation: 老酒的臭味还会留下来.需要热量才能把臭味带出来.冷可以恢复健康和热情.菜和火腿的味道很好.

segments.text: The stale smell of old beer lingers.
It takes heat to bring out the odor.
A cold dip restores health and zest.
A salt pickle tastes fine with ham.
Tacos al pastor are my favorite.
A zestful food is the hot cross bun.
